The Unofficial Paul Krugman Web Page

Jul 26, 2002

If you are interested in Paul Krugman, you may wish to check out the Unofficial Paul Krugman Web Page. It has links to the official web page as well. I found all this by reading Kaus’s blog on Slate. Of particular insterest was a link to Krugman’s recent post about the Rhinoceros Effect in which Krugman mentions what blogs he likes to read. I was not familiar with this blog on economic issues by Brad DeLong.
